MAN.TITLE: isdir
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: checks if argument is a directory path

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : a character string, the file pathname
: a boolean, true if path is a path to a directory.

DESCRIPTION.P: r=isdir(path) checks if path is a path to a directory.

ITEMIZE.label: REFERENCE
ITEMIZE.P: This function is based on the C function stat. The SCI and ~ shortcuts for Scilab directory and home directory are handled.
